item.title: WATCH: Nearly 100-year-old tortoises welcome 4 baby hatchlings at Philadelphia Zoo
item.description: The Philadelphia Zoo is celebrating the arrival of four Western Santa Cruz Galapagos tortoise hatchlings, its first in more than 150 years.

item.description: Rosario Gaggi got a major league surprise when his wife, Victoria, surprised him with Mr. Met for their big day.
